screen_desc: This screenshot shows the notifications settings in a smartphone. It displays recently sent notifications from Gmail and Google Play Store, with toggles to enable or disable them. There's also an option for notifications on the lock screen and advanced settings for notification snoozing and suggested actions.
action_think: The user wants to turn off picture-in-picture notifications. The current screen shows the 'Notifications' menu, but there's no direct option for picture-in-picture. I need to navigate to the advanced settings to look for that option.
action_plan: Scroll down in the 'Notifications' section to find advanced settings.
Enable the 'Picture-in-Picture' toggle to turn it off.
action_desc: Scroll down in the 'Notifications' section to find advanced settings.
action_result: You have returned to the previous screen. Now, you can access the "Advanced" settings where you can turn off picture-in-picture. This action has brought you closer to fulfilling the user request.
